alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 31 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northern Geauga and Lake Counties Until 1145 PM EDT.... At 1012 PM EDT, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Euclid to near Painesville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Wind gusts to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping below a half mile... Locations impacted include... Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Euclid, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Madison, Perry, Timberlake, Lakeline, Wickliffe, Richmond Heights, Willoughby Hills, Highland Heights, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Kirtland, Mayfield, and Gates Mills. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 314, 315, 326, 330, 331, and 332.
